title: Chapter 1877 - A Misunderstanding!
body:
Chapter 1877 - A Misunderstanding!

“Your wine gourd, sir!” The waiter brought over Su Yi’s green-skinned gourd. “That will be ninety-one thousand top-grade immortal jades, plus three thousand for your meal.”

Su Yi took out a bag of holding and passed it to the waiter. “The change is your tip.”

“Thank you so much, sir.” The waiter said with a smile, but when he opened the bag, he was completely dumbstruck. His heart pounded in his chest.

One hundred thousand top-grade immortal jades!

Didn’t that mean he was to receive a tip of six thousand top-grade immortal jades after subtracting the cost of the food and wine?

Fuck! With money like that, I can visit Heavenly Fragrances Brothel ten times over! I’ve got to choose their star performer! Last time I went, the manager laughed and said I wasn’t even worthy of spending the night with her serving girl, but this time… Huh? Where’d that guy go?

The waiter looked around, but the young man in blue was nowhere to be found. It was as if he’d been a dream or illusion this entire time. But the waiter’s generous tip was as real as could be, confirming that this was certainly...
